docblock.description: Base class for database result implementations. Intended to be overloaded by a higher level database system implementation class.

var.description: A tridimensional hash array containing the result data
$rowClassName Holds the name of the class that handles database results at row level. Must be set by an overloaded class

docblock.description: Creates a database provider-dependant DatabaseRow type object and returns it.
Initializes the result, receiving and storing the result handler. Intended to be overloaded by a higher level provider-specific DatabaseResult class if needed

param.description: Optional array with additional options, See DatabaseResult::$setup for available options

docblock.description: Retrieves the result from the database and stores it in $data in the form of a tridimensional array, false if no results. Must be overloaded by a higher level provider-specific DatabaseResult class

return.description: The data in the form of a tridimensional array.

docblock.description: Sets the data to the specified one

param.description: The data to set in the form of a tridimensional array.

docblock.description: Frees the database result. Must be overloaded by a higher level provider-specific DatabaseResult class
Returns the number of rows in the result. Must be overloaded by a provider-specific DatabaseResult class

return.description: The number of rows in the result.

docblock.description: Checks whether there is at least one result. Must be overloaded by a provider-specific DatabaseResult class

return.description: True if there is at least one result, false otherwise.

docblock.description: Returns the next row in the query results and advances to the next one. Must be overloaded by a provider-specific DatabaseResult class

return.description: A provider-specific DatabaseRowMysql object. False if no more rows.

docblock.description: Sets the row pointer to the beginning, so the next retrieved row will be the first. Must be overloaded by a provider-specific DatabaseResult class
Returns a list of the available keys in each row. Must be overloaded by a provider-specific DatabaseResult class

return.description: A list of the available keys in each row
the Id generated on the latest insert query
